pageContext.description: length 105.5mm; width edge 53.5mm; width mouth 41.8mm; width loop 9.8mm; depth socket 75mm; breadth mouth 41mm,Three slight vertical ribs descend from slight second moulding; slight emphasis of body angles; well bevelled edge but no distinct line; marked blade tip hollows; small pits in one side - casting flaw; traces of casting flashes plus large lump on underside of loop; stump of one runner extant at mouth; grinding marks discernible along edge; hammer marks on sides and also flattening flash; narrow flat bottom to socket end.
pageContext.patina: Milky - dark green patina; mostly covered with granular lighter green surface.
pageContext.surface: Parts of edge intact, not particularly sharp; ancient blunting/chipping towards either side; small patch recent damage - also at mouth. Light orange-brown soil adhering.
